extendedInfo.description: Listen to All the songs from Glee on your Android phone!"Glee Songs" collects ALL of the songs from one of popular musical drama-comedy (Dramedy) TV series. It is the most popular TV series in U.S. This app organizes all the performances by seasons and episodes so that you can easily find what youâre looking for. Instead of time- and memory-consuming downloads, though, âGlee Songsâ provides links to each song on YouTube. You can play any listed song at the tap of a buttonâwithout having to search or log on to the site. So, you can enjoy the beautiful songs from Glee on your Android phone!What will you find inside?- All Glee songs from every episode, from âPilotâ through last season- Access to Season one for free and season two for 0.99 via In-app Billing.- Quick links to songs at Gleeâs official YouTube channel- Favorite songs list- Amazon button to purchase song downloads- Share button to email songs to friendsEnjoy!

reviews.comment: App sucks! You can\'t watch videos unless you pay $1 and then you find out the videos don\'t work on the mobile site. Useless app and a waste of space!
